医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
自我监测在管理妊娠期高血压和先兆子痫方面显示出希望研究表明，自我监测血压可能有助于高危妊娠中高血压和先兆子痫的早期发现和管理，从而可能改变产前护理策略。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231212/Self-monitoring-shows-promise-in-managing-high-blood-Pressure-and-pre-eclampsia-in-pregnancy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231212/Self-monitoring-shows-promise-in-managing-high-blood-Pressure-and-pre-eclampsia-in-pregnancy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=930a6bd9-7074-4885-b3bf-0ad4608ceb5b Tue, 12 Dec 2023 18:38:00 -0500 Self-monitoring shows promise in managing high blood pressure and pre-eclampsia in pregnancy
研究表明素食可降低失眠风险研究表明，素食可能会降低失眠的风险，尤其是男性，这可能是由于健康植物性食品的摄入量增加和动物产品的消费量减少所致。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231212/Vegetarian-diet-linked-to-lower-risk-of-insomnia-study-suggests.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231212/Vegetarian-diet-linked-to-lower-risk-of-insomnia-study-suggests.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4e2886f0-84fb-4aa0-abdf-89e21b7198d5 Tue, 12 Dec 2023 18:31:00 -0500 Vegetarian diet linked to lower risk of insomnia, study suggests
基于人工智能的乳腺癌筛查风险模型研究人员评估了欧洲基于人工智能的乳腺癌筛查风险模型的性能。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231212/AI-based-risk-model-for-breast-cancer-screening.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231212/AI-based-risk-model-for-breast-cancer-screening.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3390fab3-63bd-48b6-9807-757b57e836fa Tue, 12 Dec 2023 12:28:00 -0500 AI-based risk model for breast cancer screening
环境干预措施在管理自闭症方面的有效性研究人员评估了自闭症儿童基于自然的干预措施的健康相关结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231212/Effectiveness-of-environmental-interventions-in-managing-autism.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231212/Effectiveness-of-environmental-interventions-in-managing-autism.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=abd135fe-cedb-4450-bf9e-987489c9147b Tue, 12 Dec 2023 12:23:00 -0500 Effectiveness of environmental interventions in managing autism
引导大流行后重新融入学校：对有特殊教育需要的儿童心理健康的全面评估研究人员研究了因 COVID-19 导致学校停课后有特殊教育需要的儿童和青少年的心理健康变化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231212/Navigating-post-pandemic-school-reintegration-A-compressive-assessment-of-mental-health-in-children-with-special-educational-needs。 ASPX https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231212/Navigating-post-pandemic-school-reintegration-A-compressive-assessment-of-mental-health-in-children-with-special-educational-needs。 aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d3491518-b7c9-4047-862b-c9ea23d89919 Tue, 12 Dec 2023 12:21:00 -0500 Navigating post-pandemic school reintegration: A comprehensive assessment of mental health in children with special educational needs
Gavi 承诺提供超过 18 亿美元支持非洲疫苗生产疫苗联盟 Gavi 表示，已承诺提供超过 18 亿美元支持非洲的疫苗生产，此举可能有助于非洲大陆解决历史上对进口疫苗的依赖问题，并建立自己强大的生物技术部门。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231212/Gavi-commits-more-than-US2418-billion-to-support-vaccine-product-in-Africa.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231212/Gavi-commits-more-than-US2418-billion-to-support-vaccine-product-in-Africa.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=caedb6d2-7455-43a5-802e-e50c42759dd8 Tue, 12 Dec 2023 10:40:05 -0500 Gavi commits more than US$1.8 billion to support vaccine production in Africa
耶拿科学家获得线粒体和神经退行性疾病治疗研究资助Kanstantsin Siniuk 博士是耶拿莱布尼茨老龄化研究所 Helmut Pospiech 博士项目组的博士后研究员，他的开创性项目线粒体和神经退行性疾病的治疗。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231212/Jena-scientist-receives-grant-for-research-on-mitochondrial-and-neurodogenic-disease-treatments.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20231212/Jena-scientist-receives-grant-for-research-on-mitochondrial-and-neurodogenic-disease-treatments.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8bbfd007-e1d1-4ea6-bb6c-233f8e54674c Tue, 12 Dec 2023 10:36:49 -0500 Jena scientist receives grant for research on mitochondrial and neurodegenerative disease treatments
